title: Shock Claims Emerge as UFO Whistleblower Says Files on 'Varginha-Type Beings' Are Classified
description: Shock claims surface after UFO researcher Jacques Vallée says classified files describe Varginha-type beings and non-human entities.

title: UFO Panic Hits Vermont as Lawmakers Push for State UAP Task Force After Years of Sightings
description: Vermont lawmakers push for a state-level UAP task force after years of unexplained sightings, signalling a major shift in airspace oversight.

title: Varginha Mania Explodes as New UFO Files Show Missing Fire Logs on Day 'Creature' Was Caught
description: Newly released Varginha fire department reports reveal erased, renumbered, and missing records on the day the alleged alien creature was captured.

title: I was very skeptical of the R.A.D UFO until I ran more than 40 miles in it — here’s why it should be on your radar
description: The R.A.D UFO running shoe has a wild design and costs $200, but it still won me over — here’s why.

title: 'This is the biggest UFO bombshell of 2026': Retired colonel testimony points to secret non-human recovery mission in Brazil
description: New details from alleged eyewitnesses have been revealed about a shocking UFO crash landing 30 years ago.
